title: Rightmove Agent Scraper
description: Extract UK estate agents and letting agents from Rightmove with comprehensive details including contact information, office addresses, property counts, and agent profiles.

startUrl.title: Search URL
startUrl.description: Rightmove agent search URL. Leave empty to use search parameters below.

searchLocation.title: Search Location
searchLocation.description: Location name to search for estate agents (e.g., 'London', 'Manchester', 'Birmingham')

locationIdentifier.title: Location Identifier
locationIdentifier.description: Rightmove location identifier (e.g., REGION^87490 for London). Leave empty to search by location name.

radius.title: Search Radius
radius.description: Search radius from location in miles

brandName.title: Brand/Agent Name
brandName.description: Filter by specific agent brand name (optional, leave empty for all agents)

branchType.title: Branch Type
branchType.description: Type of agent branches to search

collectAgentDetails.title: Collect Full Agent Details
collectAgentDetails.description: Visit each agent's profile page to extract complete information including full description, email, website, property counts, and services. Increases runtime but provides comprehensive data.

maxResults.title: Maximum Agents
maxResults.description: Maximum number of estate agents to collect (1-1000)

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process (each page contains ~10 agents)

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended to avoid blocking.
